Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.objects

Class NetColorPreparation

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.objects.NetObject
it.polimi.ingsw.network.objects.NetColorPreparation
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class NetColorPreparation
extends NetObject
This class is a class used to exchange messages between clients and server in the color phase of the game when players have to choose a color. More information about game phase can be found on it.polimi.ingsw.core.state package.
See Also:

    Constructor Description
    NetColorPreparation​(java.lang.String msg)
    Creates a standard message and only calls the super constructor.
    NetColorPreparation​(java.lang.String msg, java.lang.String player)
    Creates a message with a message and a player's name.
    NetColorPreparation​(java.lang.String msg, java.lang.String player, Color c)

    NetColorPreparation​(java.lang.String msg, java.lang.String player, Color c, NetColorPreparation next)

    • NetColorPreparation

      public NetColorPreparation​(java.lang.String msg, java.lang.String player, Color c) throws java.lang.NullPointerException
      Creates a message sent from the client to the server indicating the player's color choice.
      Parameters:
      msg - is the message to be sent
      player - is the player's name
      c - is the color chosen by the player
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if msg is null or player is null or c is null

    • NetColorPreparation

      public NetColorPreparation​(java.lang.String msg, java.lang.String player, Color c, NetColorPreparation next) throws java.lang.NullPointerException
      Creates a message from the server to the client with a player's color choice concatenating to other NetColorPreparation objects.
      Parameters:
      msg - is the message to be sent
      player - is the player's name
      c - is the color chosen by the player
      next - is the next element to concatenated to the dynamic list
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if msg is null or player is null or c is null
